actions.text: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Delaney.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment adds an additional finding that the United States has reduced its oil consumption over the past decade, and increasing investment in clean energy technology and energy efficiency will lower energy prices, reduce greenhouse gas emissions and increase national security.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-290 to add an additional finding that the United States has reduced its oil consumption over the past decade, and increasing investment in clean energy technology and energy efficiency will lower energy prices, reduce greenhouse gas emissions and increase national security.
